snippet: Senate negotiators need to ensure that a tentative agreement to reopen the government doesn’t give in to Republican blackmail.
abstract: Editorial urges Senate to not give in to Republican blackmail as it nears deal to reopen government and end imminent threat of default; says concessions will only ensure similar debacle when debt ceiling comes up again; warns of catastrophic consequences should default occur.
lead_paragraph: Senate negotiators need to ensure that a tentative agreement to reopen the government doesn’t give in to Republican blackmail.

headline.main: The Senate Tries to End the Crisis
headline.print_headline: The Senate Tries to End the Crisis

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
